WorkItem.Description:
Thanks for the marvelous library! Alas, I have an issue using it.

Currently the only way to add a function is to make it public static in a class. This prevents from passing runtime-dependent arguments in case several Flee engines are running. It'd be more flexible to allow adding instance methods (e.g. with MethodInfo and Object).

Comments.Message: Or even better, allow adding a delegate / lambda.
Or even better, allow adding a delegate / lambda.
